title: Paneer and Vegetable Tikka Masala
instructions: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan and sauté the paneer until golden brown. Set aside.
In the same pan, add another tablespoon of oil and sauté the onions, carrots, and capsicum until they are tender.
Add the peas, potatoes, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and red chili powder to the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add the diced tomatoes to the pan and cook until they are soft and the mixture is well combined.
Add the cooked paneer to the pan and stir well. Season with salt to taste.
Add a little water to the pan if the mixture is too thick. If desired, add cream or yogurt to give the dish a creamy texture.
Simmer the mixture for 5-7 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
Serve the Paneer and Vegetable Tikka Masala hot, garnished with fresh cilantro or basil leaves.
